startButtonSpanish.message: Presente su tarjeta o Escriba su Número de Empleado/NIP

callAttendent.description: Notifies an attendant that help is needed

returnMainMenu.description: Cancels the current transaction and returns to the main menu

returnPaymentTypes.description: Button to return to the payment options page

touchToType.description: Placeholder on input boxes that instruct the user to touch to being typing

receiptHeader.description: The header of the receipt items

subtotalTitle.description: The subtotal of all the receipt items

taxTitle.description: The total tax of all the receipt items

totalTitle.description: The grand total of all the receipt items

pageCheckoutInstructions.description: Instruct user to scan their items or select an option

lookupItemTitle.description: Title for the Lookup Item button

lookupItemDescription.message: Navegar a través de nuestros productos y encontrar un elemento.
lookupItemDescription.description: Description for the Lookup Item button

largeItemTitle.description: Title for the Large Item button

largeItemDescription.message: Llame a un asistente para escanear un artículo grande en su cesta.
largeItemDescription.description: Description for the Large Item button

typeInSkuTitle.description: Title for the Type In SKU button

typeInSkuDescription.message: Añadir un elemento utilizando los productos número de SKU.
typeInSkuDescription.description: Description for the Type In SKU button

pageLookupTitle.description: Title for the product search page

pageLookupInstructions.message: Utilice el teclado en pantalla para encontrar un producto mediante la búsqueda de el nombre del producto
pageLookupInstructions.description: Instruct the user to look up an item by the product's name

pagePaymentOptionsTitle.description: Title for the payment method page

pagePaymentOptionsInstructions.description: Instruct the user to choose a payment option

pageInvalidPaymentTitle.description: Title for the invalid payment page

pageInvalidPaymentInstructions.message:
Lo sentimos, este dispositivo está configurado actualmente sólo a aceptar la tarjeta de crédito o débito como formas de pago. Pedimos disculpas por las molestias.

Por favor, seleccione "Volver a Tipos de Pago" para elegir un tipo de pago válida, o esperar a un asistente para completar su transacción.
pageInvalidPaymentInstructions.description: Detailed message indicating that the selected payment method is invalid, and to return to the payment options page

pagePaymentInstructions.message: Use el teclado de PIN para completar la transacción
pagePaymentInstructions.description: Instruct the user to use the PIN pad to complete their transaction

pageCompleteThanks.description: Thank the user for shopping at the store

pageCompleteBags.message: Por favor, retire las bolsas de la zona de embolsado y lleve su recibo.
pageCompleteBags.description: Instruct the user to remove their bags and take their receipt

overlayConfirm.description: Confirm the cancellation of the transaction

overlayLargeItem.message: Por favor, espera y un acompañante estará con usted en breve para escanear su ítem grande.
overlayLargeItem.description: Instruct the user to wait for an attendant to scan their large item

overlaySku.message: Utilice el teclado en pantalla para introducir SKU de un producto, a continuación, seleccione "Continuar" para añadirlo a sus ítems.
overlaySku.description: Instruct the user to use the on screen keyboard to type in an SKU

overlayCallAttendant.message: Un asistente se ha notificado y estará con usted en breve. Seleccione "Continuar" reanudar el registro de salida.
overlayCallAttendant.description: Instruct the user that an attendant will assist them momentarily

overlayScale.message: Ponga por favor su artículo en la escala.
overlayScale.description: Instruct the user to place their item on the scale

overlayScaleWait.description: Instruct the user to wait for the scale to finish weighing

overlayCancelTransaction.message: Está seguro que desea cancelar la transacción?
overlayCancelTransaction.description: Ask the user if they are sure they wish to cancel the transaction
